access: You are from the Mwangi Expanse.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Magic Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=19)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters from the Mwangi Expanse have access to the Magic Warrior Dedication feat (page 95)._

You mix magic and martial prowess, following in the tradition of the Ten Magic Warriors of Old-Mage Jatembe.

name: Magic Warrior
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ability to cast focus spells

**Access**
You are from the Mwangi Expanse.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You mix magic and martial prowess, following in the tradition of the Ten Magic Warriors of Old-Mage Jatembe.
</summary>
